name: Three Body Problem #024P - GLTCH - Phobos Cartridge
description: The Three Body Problem is the task of predicting accurately the positions and speeds of three orbiting bodies. The equations that govern this are deterministic, yet the task is impossible, and small errors feed forward and lead to total unpredictability. Press X to explore new seeds, new instances of the simulation. Press Z to change the dithering. Find the source code here https://github.com/atomoton/threebodyproblem/blob/master/WIP/chaos_theory.p8 to see any changes to the simulation or visualization code. more details @ twitter.com/aebrer
